images.title: It's Tolkien Reading Day
images.caption: It's Tolkien Reading Day
images.desc: For Tolkien Reading Day, we're featuring Oxford University's Radcliffe Camera, home to the world's largest archive of J.R.R. Tolkien's original manuscripts and drawings. While Tolkien never worked in the Radcliffe Camera (Latin for 'room'), he both studied here at Oxford (graduating in 1915 with first-class honours in English language) and taught here as a professor of Anglo-Saxon and later as a professor of English language and literature.
